name: Miner's Lament
description:
The struggle for survival can come when you least expect it.

Escaping back to your homeland seemed like an easy task, given the generous loan you were given. But who could know that the man you were dealing with was so cruel. Being forced to work in the mines for 10 days, you must somehow pay off the loan and keep your family fed while they wait for this misfortune to be over.

Miner's Lament is a survival mining game where you look for ore during your work shifts and use whatever scraps you're left with to buy food for yourself and your family. Time is limited, so you must plan your paths and dig smartly to get the ore you need and come back in time every day.
